title: Little Mouse
author: Little Mouse
created_time: February 16, 2023, 03:18:52 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 06:19:08 PM by Little Mouse
content: The L.U.C.K Project AKA project #7777 is happy to present you the Exclusive signature campaign for spreading awareness about BONKz. We are looking for a few Bitcointalk users to promote project #7777.PaymentSR Member and above- $70/week (Payable in BTC)There's a limit of total slots but most of the qualified users will be accepted.Announcement      SpreadsheetCampaign RulesWear the appropriate signature and avatar.You can't wear any other signature during your participation in this campaign.Be active on daily basis (at least 5 days/week).To be eligible for the weekly payment, you must have posted a minimum of 20 times throughout the week.Posts in Off-topic, Games and Rounds, Gambling, Gambling Discussion, Investor-based games, Archival, Politics and Society, and any other signature/bounty campaign thread along with boards/threads where signature isn't displayed, won't be counted towards weekly post counts.Post must be above 150 characters, I can deny any of your posts as eligible if they are not constructive.If you have a negative tag, you may not get accepted BUT there's an exception based on the depth of the negative tag.You, a person, are not allowed to enroll with more than one account.Each week will start on Saturday and be ended on Friday UTC 23:59:00.I'm holding one week's fund.There's no guarantee of how many weeks the campaign will run. It may end up after 1st week or it may run for a few years. Nothing guaranteed.I reserve the right to pause the campaign anytime and deny any post you made as eligible.Posts in ANN thread of L.U.C.K project is not mandatory to get paid but encouraged.If you are accepted, please wear signature and avatar. Check out the spreadsheet whether your information is correct or not.Apply with the below format-Code:Bitcointalk Profile URL:Post count (Including this one):Your BTC address (segwit):SIGNATUREMemberCode:[center]▀▄████████▀▄          [url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5434768]T  h  e      L  .  U  .  C  .  K  .     P  r  o  j  e  c  t[/url]          ▄▀████████▄▀[i]The Lurking Utility Cyberspace Key Project[/i]▀██████████▄ [    [url=https://twitter.com/7777BONKz]Twitter[/url]    ] █████ [    [url=http://discord.com]Discord[/url]    ] █████ [    [url=https://www.reddit.com/user/BONKz_7777]Reddit[/url]    ] ▄██████████▀[/center]Full MemberCode:[center][url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5434768][color=#ddd860]▀▄████████▀▄          [font=arial black][color=#000]T  h  e      L  .  U  .  C  .  K  .     P  r  o  j  e  c  t[/color][/font]          ▄▀████████▄▀[font=tahoma][b][i][color=#777]The Lurking Utility Cyberspace Key Project[/color][/i][/font][/url][color=#ddd860]▀██████████▄ [color=#000][    [url=https://twitter.com/7777BONKz][font=tahoma][b][color=#000]Twitter[/color][/font][/url]    ][/color] █████ [color=#000][    [url=http://discord.com][font=tahoma][b][color=#000]Discord[/color][/font][/url]    ][/color] █████ [color=#000][    [url=https://www.reddit.com/user/BONKz_7777][font=tahoma][b][color=#000]Reddit[/color][/font][/url]    ][/color] ▄██████████▀[/color][/center]Sr MemberCode:[center][table][tr][td][center][url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5434768][color=#000][font=impact][size=18pt]The L.U.C.K.
